# **Data preparation**

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
library(massdataset)
library(demodata)
library(tidyverse)
library(massstat)
data("liver_aging_pos", package = "demodata")
liver_aging_pos
```

# **PCA analysis**

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
library(massdataset)
library(demodata)
library(tidyverse)
data("liver_aging_pos", package = "demodata")
liver_aging_pos

pca_object =
liver_aging_pos %>%
  scale() %>%
  run_pca()

pca_score_plot(liver_aging_pos,
               pca_object,
               color_by = "group",
               loadings = TRUE) +
  ggsci::scale_fill_lancet() +
  ggsci::scale_color_lancet()
```
